list.name: BOTTOMLESS-MAGS
list.description: Reload x ammo and drop a shell next to Pierce.

list.name: YOU-ONLY-BRAWL-TWICE
list.description: Pierce will absorb all shells and gain x shield for each one, while also pushing back nearby enemies.
